translation.en: Are you hungry, Mr. Harker?
No, I'm-- -I'm fine. -[door opens]
-Thank you. -Then perhaps we can talk.
I'm Sister Agatha.
[Harker] I thought I'd met all the sisters.
I have been sequestered.
[Harker] In prayer?
In study, Mr. Harker, of you.
translation.it: - A pregare? - A studiare. A studiare lei, sig. Harker.

translation.en: I've read your account of your most interesting stay in Transylvania.
translation.it: Ho letto il racconto del suo soggiorno in Transilvania.

translation.en: [Harker] It's the truth.
All of it. [Agatha] And what a lot of truth there is.
Sister Angela tells me you wrote all day and all night for a whole week.
translation.it: Suor Angela mi dice che ha scritto giorno e notte per una settimana.

translation.en: Please, sit with me.
-Is the sun a little bright for you? -No.
translation.it: - Il sole è troppo luminoso? - No.

translation.en: Good.
That's good, isn't it?
Ah, my dear, come in.
We are to be observed.
Apparently, I cannot be trusted alone with a man.
translation.it: Non si fidano a lasciarmi sola con un uomo.

translation.en: Consider yourself chaperoned.
Mr. Harker, I intend no impertinence, but why are you still alive?
translation.it: Sig. Harker, mi scusi l'insolenza, ma perché è ancora vivo?

translation.en: I fled. I was trapped. I escaped.
translation.it: Ero in trappola e sono fuggito.

translation.en: -Escaped, yes. -I fled that place in terror of my life.
translation.it: - Fuggito, sì. - Sono scappato per paura di morire.

translation.en: He is a monster.
I swear to you.
He is the Devil himself. Then why have you stopped?
translation.it: - È il Diavolo in persona. - E perché interromperla?

translation.en: -Stopped what? -Fleeing.
You've been here nearly a month.
translation.it: È qui da quasi un mese.

translation.en: I'm safe with you.
This is a house of God. A house of God, is it? [laughs]
translation.it: - Questa è una casa di Dio. - Una casa di Dio?

translation.en: Well, that's good. We could do with a man about the place, eh, Sister?
translation.it: Buona questa. Ci farebbe comodo un uomo in casa, eh?

translation.en: Two years ago, a church in this town collapsed.
translation.it: Due anni fa, una chiesa in città è crollata.

translation.en: The roof fell on the congregation, killed everyone as they prayed,
translation.it: Il tetto è caduto sulla congregazione uccidendo tutti,

translation.en: including the children.
The priest was the only survivor. Priests are like that.
translation.it: Il prete è l'unico sopravvissuto. Tipico.

translation.en: He said to me afterwards that even in moments like these,
translation.it: Mi ha detto dopo che, anche in momenti del genere,

translation.en: he was able to maintain his faith.
translation.it: la sua fede è stata incrollabile.

translation.en: I told him he should have maintained his roof.
translation.it: Era meglio se non crollava il tetto.

translation.en: -[fly buzzing] -Look to your own protection, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Pensi a proteggersi da solo, sig. Harker.

translation.en: -God doesn't care. -[Harker scoffs]
The way you talk,
it's unusual in someone of your calling.
translation.it: è insolito per una con la sua vocazione.

translation.en: My calling was a very long time ago.
translation.it: Quella risale a molto tempo fa.

translation.en: What's wrong?
You have something in your eye.
Is it gone?
Yes.
Your fiancée, Mina,
you mentioned her a lot when you first arrived. Mina Murray.
translation.it: Ne ha parlato spesso al suo arrivo, Mina Murray.

translation.en: Oh, uh, yes.
-I need to contact her. -You must love her very much.
Of course.
Perhaps, in time, you will let her read this account.
translation.it: Forse, un giorno, le farà leggere il racconto.

translation.en: -If she wishes, yes. -So, out of kindness,
translation.it: - Se vuole, sì. - Quindi, per gentilezza,

translation.en: you've omitted from your writings anything that would alarm or disturb her?
translation.it: ha omesso tutto ciò che potesse allarmarla o disturbarla?

translation.en: Well, I didn't want to--
So now you may tell me everything
that occurred in the time you spent with the Count at his castle.
translation.it: che è accaduto mentre era col conte nel castello.

translation.en: Your dinners, your conversations, your intimate moments.
translation.it: Le cene, le conversazioni, i momenti intimi.

translation.en: Your life may depend on your complete honesty.
translation.it: La sua vita dipende dalla sua totale sincerità.

translation.en: Do you understand what I'm asking you?
I think so.
I'm asking, Mr. Harker,
if you had sexual intercourse with Count Dracula.
translation.it: se ha avuto rapporti sessuali col Conte Dracula.

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Harker.
Mr. Harker, please.
You must take this.
That's very kind of you, thank you.
-I couldn't possibly. -You must.
-Thank you. -[woman] You will need this.
[Harker] Driver,
I'm sorry, but we still seem to be some distance from the castle.
translation.it: mi scusi, ma siamo ancora lontani dal castello.

translation.en: [driver] It's as close as we are going.
-The Count will find you here. -How?
translation.it: - Il conte la troverà qui. - E come?

translation.en: He finds people.
He will send his driver.
[woman] My darling Johnny...
[woman] You are to travel to a distant land,
translation.it: stai per viaggiare in una terra lontana

translation.en: and I shall miss you very much every single day.
translation.it: e mi mancherai tantissimo, ogni giorno.

translation.en: It seems to me likely that you will meet some very exciting women
translation.it: È probabile che incontrerai donne molto eccitanti

translation.en: as you travel across Europe to Transylvania,
translation.it: viaggiando in Europa verso la Transilvania,

translation.en: and I wanted to assure you that, should you fall prey to temptation,
translation.it: e volevo assicurarti che, se cadessi vittima della tentazione,

translation.en: I, as your dutiful fiancée, will completely understand.
translation.it: io, in veste di tua devota fidanzata, lo capirò perfettamente.

translation.en: The certainty of our coming wedding
is all the consolation a young woman could require.
translation.it: basterebbe a consolare ogni giovane donna.

translation.en: Well, apart from the very handsome Doctor Holmwood,
translation.it: Beh, come anche il bellissimo dottor Holmwood,

translation.en: your friends Reggie and Barnaby who always seem so pleased to see me,
translation.it: i tuoi amici Reggie e Barnaby, sempre così felici di vedermi,

translation.en: lovely Edwin from your office,
the butcher's boy who has filled out quite deliciously in recent months,
translation.it: il figlio del macellaio, che è sbocciato di recente

translation.en: and should I want for variety, the adorable barmaid at the Rose and Crown,
translation.it: e, a voler un tocco di varietà, la bella barista del The Rose and Crown,

translation.en: who I know you have also admired.
I feel certain we shall be mindful
of each other at all times during our separation.
All my love and, I hope, all yours, your adoring Mina.
translation.it: Tutto il mio amore e, spero, tutto il tuo. La tua adorante Mina."

translation.en: Actually, driver, could you help me with my cases?
translation.it: Cocchiere, mi aiuterebbe con le valigie?

translation.en: Charming.
Hello?
Hello? [echoes]
[Harker] Anyone at home?
Hello?
[stammers] I'm sorry. I...
The wine was open, I assumed...
translation.it: Il vino era aperto, ho pensato...

translation.en: Perhaps I could pour you some, Count?
I do not drink...
wine.
I bid you welcome, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Le do il benvenuto, sig. Harker.

translation.en: I am...
Your employer speaks highly of you, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Il suo capo mi ha parlato molto bene di lei, sig. Harker.

translation.en: Yes. The property has been purchased in your name.
translation.it: Sì, la proprietà è stata acquistata a suo nome.

translation.en: -Everything is in order. -[grunts]
[Harker] I need only your signature on a few documents,
and Carfax Abbey will be yours.
I am looking forward to England, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di andare in Inghilterra.

translation.en: People here, they are so narrow.
translation.it: La gente qui è così limitata.

translation.en: I wither among them.
They are without...
They are without flavor.
Perhaps you mean "character"?
Perhaps.
This is good, Mr. Harker.
You must correct my English at all times.
From you, I shall learn to pass among your countrymen
translation.it: Così riuscirò a confondermi tra i suoi connazionali

translation.en: as one of their own.
Your English is already excellent, Count.
translation.it: Lo parla già molto bene, Conte.

translation.en: You flatter me.
No, I don't.
However, I'm afraid I will be leaving here tomorrow.
translation.it: Tuttavia, temo che andrò via domani.

translation.en: I have to return to England immediately.
Sorry?
Your apology is unnecessary.
You are staying.
-It has already been agreed. -With whom?
translation.it: - È già stato deciso. - Da chi?

translation.en: Your superiors.
You will remain with me for one month
translation.it: Lei rimarrà con me un mese

translation.en: and assist me with my English and my understanding of your culture.
translation.it: e mi aiuterà con l'inglese e la comprensione della vostra cultura.

translation.en: -But, Count, I-- -Do not-- No, please.
translation.it: - Ma Conte, io... - No, la prego.

translation.en: Do not look so concerned, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Non faccia quella faccia preoccupata, sig. Harker.

translation.en: You are most welcome.
Count... Count Dracula, I'm a lawyer,
I'm not a teacher.
There will be no need to teach.
translation.it: Non ci sarà bisogno di insegnare.

translation.en: Simply remain at my side, and I shall...
translation.it: Lei rimanga al mio fianco e io...

translation.en: absorb you.
[Agatha] That word...
"absorb," he said that?
Yes.
"Absorb."
[Dracula] Please, pay close attention.
You will not find my home easy to navigate.
translation.it: Non le sarà facile orientarsi in questa casa.

translation.en: It is a rising labyrinth of stairs and doors and shadows.
translation.it: Si erge come un labirinto di scale, porte e ombre.

translation.en: Yes, quite remarkable.
-One would almost need a map. -There is no map of my castle.
translation.it: - Servirebbe una mappa. - Non esistono mappe del castello.

translation.en: No complete design was ever committed to paper.
translation.it: Nessun progetto finito è mai stato messo su carta.

translation.en: It is said many souls are lost in the tangle of the corridors.
translation.it: Si dice che molte anime siano perse nel ginepraio dei corridoi.

translation.en: The prison without locks.
Perhaps you have heard of the architect, Petruvio the Widower?
translation.it: Forse conosce il suo architetto, Petruvio il Vedovo?

translation.en: -No. -This castle was the widower's final work.
translation.it: - No. - Questo castello è il suo ultimo lavoro.

translation.en: A monument to his lost love and the sunlight
translation.it: Un monumento al suo amore perduto e alla luce del sole

translation.en: to which he could never return.
Legend has it
that he died here
in the arms of his wife.
translation.it: tra le braccia di sua moglie.

translation.en: If he was a widower, surely she died before him.
translation.it: Se era vedovo, lei sarà morta prima di lui.

translation.en: It must have been a cold embrace.
translation.it: Deve essere stato un freddo abbraccio, allora.

translation.en: Do not be impatient with those sweet little things.
translation.it: Non sia impaziente con quei dolci esserini.

translation.en: They are man's companion to the end and beyond.
translation.it: Sono compagne dell'uomo fino alla fine e oltre.

translation.en: Where there is flesh,
there are flies.
In the morning, you will find the sunlight will be streaming
translation.it: Al mattino, vedrà che la luce del sole inonderà la stanza

translation.en: through this window.
Fortunately the drapes are very thick.
translation.it: Per fortuna le tende sono molto spesse.

translation.en: [Dracula] Please excuse the absence of my staff.
They are not here at night.
Forgive me. I am clumsy.
Of course, Count,
though perhaps you could lend me a replacement.
translation.it: anche se magari può prestarmene uno lei.

translation.en: I am afraid I do not possess such a thing.
translation.it: Temo di non possedere niente di simile.

translation.en: -You don't have any mirrors? -[sighs]
Baubles of vanity.
What is the purpose of a mirror?
One will find no enlightenment in one's own gaze.
translation.it: Non si trova alcuna ispirazione nel fissare se stessi.

translation.en: Are you all right, Mr. Harker?
Oh, I'm fine. It's, uh...
-just a scratch. -Please be careful.
translation.it: - un graffio. - La prego, faccia attenzione.

translation.en: We cannot return you in any way damaged
to your beautiful Mina.
It's nothing, it's just--
Did I mention Mina?
I think you spoke of her beauty at dinner.
translation.it: Credo abbia parlato della sua bellezza a cena.

translation.en: don't recall that.
Perhaps it was the wine.
No, I barely drank.
My sympathies.
Please, attend to your hand.
translation.it: La prego, si prenda cura della sua mano.

translation.en: It's really fine. It's nothing.
translation.it: Sta bene così, non è niente.

translation.en: Blood is not nothing.
Blood is lives. [Agatha] Lives?
You are quite certain he did not say, "Blood is life"?
translation.it: È sicuro che non abbia detto: "È vita"?

translation.en: -He said, "Blood is lives"? -He did.
translation.it: - Ha detto: "Il sangue è vite"? - Esatto.

translation.en: Yes.
It struck me as odd.
But there were other oddnesses that preoccupied you?
How could he know my thoughts?
I never mentioned Mina at dinner.
I'm certain of it.
A dog can sniff stories on the slightest breeze,
translation.it: Un cane annusa le storie nel vento, mentre noi restiamo ignari.

translation.en: while we are blind in the wind.
translation.it: nel vento, mentre noi restiamo ignari.

translation.en: He could smell my thoughts in the air?
No, Mr. Harker, that would be ridiculous.
But perhaps in your blood.
Perhaps stories flow in our veins if you know how to read them.
translation.it: Forse le storie scorrono nelle nostre vene, basta saperle leggere.

translation.en: Blood is lives.
You will not see me till tomorrow evening. I have, uh, several appointments.
translation.it: Non mi vedrà fino a domani sera, ho... diversi appuntamenti.

translation.en: Till then, please treat my home as your own.
translation.it: Fino ad allora, faccia come se fosse a casa sua.

translation.en: I bid you good night.
Good night--
Is someone-- [yells]
Hello?
Hello?
So, there was another guest in the castle?
translation.it: C'era un altro ospite nel castello?

translation.en: Perhaps also a prisoner.
[Harker] I didn't realize I was a prisoner at the time.
translation.it: Ancora non sapevo di essere un prigioniero.

translation.en: That night, then?
-I slept. -You dreamed?
I woke early.
No, wait. You dreamed.
After a day of such incident and color, how could you not?
translation.it: Dopo una giornata così piena, come poteva non farlo?

translation.en: [Agatha] Was it Mina you dreamed of?
You longed for her.
One longs for the solace of home.
translation.it: Si desidera il conforto di casa.

translation.en: [Agatha] One longs, certainly.
Tell me more about your dream.
It is private.
[Agatha] You ache for her.
You were together in your dream.
translation.it: - Eravate insieme nel sogno. - Io non...

translation.en: I don't see-- This is not--
[Agatha] There is no shame in it.
Dreams are a haven where we sin without consequence.
translation.it: I sogni sono un rifugio in cui pecchiamo senza conseguenze.

translation.en: Believe me, I know.
Some mornings, I can hardly look Sister Rosa in the face.
translation.it: Certe mattine faccio fatica a guardare in faccia Suor Rosa.

translation.en: What you asked before, if I'd ever--
translation.it: Prima mi ha domandato - se avevo... - Se aveva avuto rapporti sessuali

translation.en: If you'd ever had sexual intercourse with Count Dracula.
translation.it: - se avevo... - Se aveva avuto rapporti sessuali con il conte.

translation.en: Why did you ask that?
Clearly you have been contaminated with something.
translation.it: Lei è stato chiaramente contaminato da qualcosa.

translation.en: Any contact you've had with Count Dracula,
translation.it: Ogni contatto avuto col Conte Dracula,

translation.en: sexual or otherwise,
is therefore relevant.
[Agatha] Continue.
"Help us."
[Agatha] So, it struck you as strange, of course.
[Harker] Well, clearly, there was someone trapped in the castle.
translation.it: Chiaramente c'era qualcun altro intrappolato lì.

translation.en: [Agatha] No. No, the writing. "Help us."
It was upside down.
[Agatha] Yes, of course, because whoever wrote it was obliged to hang that way.
translation.it: Sì, certo, perché chiunque l'abbia scritta era appeso.

translation.en: But even that extraordinary physical feat is surely not the point of interest.
translation.it: Ma non è nemmeno quella straordinaria impresa fisica a destare interesse.

translation.en: Then what is?
What is remarkable, Mr. Harker...
what is convenient is that the words were in English.
translation.it: La cosa comoda era che la scritta fosse in inglese.

translation.en: I didn't think of that.
Of course not. You are an Englishman:
translation.it: - Non ci avevo pensato. - Ovvio. Lei è un uomo ed è inglese,

translation.en: a combination of presumptions beyond compare.
translation.it: una combinazione di arroganza senza paragone.

translation.en: Proceed.
[Harker] I knew I had the day to myself,
translation.it: Sapevo che sarei stato solo, quel giorno,

translation.en: so I determined to find the room above mine
translation.it: ed ero deciso a trovare la stanza sopra la mia

translation.en: and see if anyone required my assistance.
translation.it: per vedere se qualcuno aveva bisogno d'aiuto.

translation.en: [Agatha] Tell me.
How did you feel?
[Harker] Different, older.
But very curious. At least I knew I was not alone.
translation.it: Ma molto curioso. Almeno sapevo di non essere solo.

translation.en: The Count hadn't been exaggerating about his castle.
translation.it: Il conte non aveva esagerato riguardo al castello.

translation.en: Hello?
Whatever way I turned,
it never took me where I expected.
Every door I opened led to two more, and then three.
translation.it: Ogni porta che aprivo conduceva ad altre due o tre porte.

translation.en: Every step I took,
I made the wrong choice.
I was lost in the architect's labyrinth.
I wasted most of the day
until I found myself too tired to go on.
translation.it: fino a essere troppo stanco per continuare.

translation.en: [Dracula] Sorry, didn't mean to startle you.
I think you've been working too hard.
Count. [Dracula] Please, relax.
Have a glass of wine.
Your voice...
you sound different.
[Dracula] I've been working on my English.
-Ah... -[Dracula] Do you approve?
It's almost perfect.
[Dracula] The credit is all yours.
Your presence has invigorated me.
translation.it: La sua presenza mi ha rinvigorito.

translation.en: Fresh blood.
[Harker] "Help us."
Hello?
Hello?
Hello? Excuse me?
Please, I intend you no harm.
translation.it: La prego, non voglio farle del male.

translation.en: However fleeting the sight, surely this was proof that I wasn't going mad.
translation.it: Per quanto solo un'apparizione fugace, era la prova che non stavo impazzendo.

translation.en: [Harker] Count Dracula?
Are we alone in this castle?
Yes.
Except for the servants, of course.
-I never see any servants. -They aren't here at nights.
translation.it: - Io non vedo mai nessuno. - Non ci sono di notte.

translation.en: I don't see them in the daytime either.
translation.it: Non li vedo nemmeno di giorno.

translation.en: In fact,
apart from the driver,
I haven't seen anyone working here at all.
translation.it: non ho visto nessun altro lavorare qui.

translation.en: Ah, yes, the driver.
[Harker] What I'm asking is,
aside from yourself,
is there anyone living in this castle?
there's no one living here.
translation.it: non c'è nessun altro che vive qui.

translation.en: [Agatha] So after sundown each day,
translation.it: Quindi ogni sera dopo il tramonto

translation.en: Dracula appeared stronger and younger,
translation.it: Dracula appariva più giovane e forte,

translation.en: while the opposite was true for you.
translation.it: mentre il contrario valeva per lei.

translation.en: Did you understand what was happening to you?
No, not then. I thought I was sick, just...
translation.it: No, all'epoca no. Pensavo di essere malato, solo...

translation.en: sick.
Turn your head to the side.
Why?
Show me.
You have been very strong, Mr. Harker.
translation.it: Lei è stato molto forte, sig. Harker.

translation.en: In your circumstances, I don't think I could have been half so brave.
translation.it: Al posto suo, non sarei stata così coraggiosa.

translation.en: I wasn't brave. In what way was I brave?
translation.it: Non sono stato coraggioso, perché dice così?

translation.en: [Sister] You were trapped in that place. You were afraid,
translation.it: Era intrappolato in quel posto, aveva paura,

translation.en: and yet you spent your days searching the castle
because you thought someone needed your help.
Well, my help had been requested. It...
It would have been difficult to refuse that.
Difficult?
Unacceptable.
So, your search continued.
Tell us.
[Harker] My every exploration led me deeper and deeper into the labyrinth.
translation.it: Ogni esplorazione mi portava più in profondità nel labirinto.

translation.en: Eventually, I made a remarkable discovery.
translation.it: Alla fine, ho fatto una scoperta incredibile.

translation.en: What had become of these people?
Were they my predecessors?
It's all I remember.
I fear I may have passed out.
Quite understandable.
Do you know what that is?
It sounded like a curse.
It's Romanian.
It means "kill me."
[Harker] They looked dead already.
Dead and walking.
[Agatha] Undead.
Tell me.
There is a contagion,
a corruption passing through this world from one sufferer to the next.
translation.it: un'alterazione che attraversa il mondo, da un malato all'altro.

translation.en: For those unfortunates who fall victim to it, life becomes incurable.
translation.it: Per gli sfortunati che ne sono colpiti, la vita diventa un male incurabile.

translation.en: They lose the divine ability to die.
As their bodies rot, their consciousness persists.
translation.it: I loro corpi marciscono, ma la loro coscienza persiste.

translation.en: Even as dust, their pain goes on.
translation.it: Anche da polvere, il dolore continua.

translation.en: It is a secret every gravedigger keeps.
There are those among us
destined to scratch at our coffin lids for all eternity.
translation.it: a graffiare il coperchio della bara in eterno.

translation.en: If you work among the dead, it's not death you fear,
translation.it: Se lavori coi morti, non temi la morte.

translation.en: it's the alternative.
Is there any salvation for such creatures?
-[Agatha] I don't know. -Have faith!
Faith is a sleeping draught for children and simpletons.
translation.it: La fede è un sonnifero per bambini e babbei.

translation.en: What we must have...
is a plan.
[Harker] Dracula's one of them, isn't he?
translation.it: Dracula è uno di loro, vero?

translation.en: Undead?
Undead, certainly, but from your account, I think he's much more complicated.
translation.it: Lo è di certo, ma dal suo racconto sembra molto più complicato.

translation.en: [Dracula] Johnny, there you are.
I thought we'd lost you.
[groans] What am I doing here?
Well, I found you downstairs, asleep on the floor.
translation.it: Ti ho trovato di sotto, addormentato sul pavimento.

translation.en: I could be wrong, but I think you were having a nightmare.
translation.it: Mi sbaglierò, ma credo tu abbia avuto un incubo.

translation.en: You do look rather pale.
You said you didn't drink.
Wine. Now... [clears throat] ...listen,
I need you to do something.
translation.it: ho bisogno che tu faccia una cosa.

translation.en: Now, sit yourself down. There you go. That's the ticket.
translation.it: Dai, siediti. Ecco fatto. Così si fa. Ora, prendi questa.

translation.en: Now, take this.
translation.it: Così si fa. Ora, prendi questa.

translation.en: I need you to write three letters.
What was that?
-That's nothing. -It sounded like a baby.
[chuckles] No, no, no. There's no baby. Now, Johnny, concentrate. Three letters.
translation.it: No, non c'è nessun bambino. Dai, Johnny, concentrati. Tre lettere.

translation.en: No one calls me Johnny.
No one? No one.
Company for you while you work.
Who is she?
Don't you recognize her?
Why would I?
I took it from your room. It's Mina, your fiancée.
translation.it: L'ho preso dalla tua stanza. È Mina, la tua fidanzata.

translation.en: Mina Murray.
How...
How can I not recognize her face?
translation.it: Perché non riconosco il suo viso?

translation.en: Well, you do look rather...
drained.
You look young.
And I owe it all to you.
translation.it: E il merito è tutto tuo.

translation.en: Thanks.
Now, it's almost time for you to go, so three letters,
translation.it: Visto che è quasi ora che tu vada, scrivi tre lettere,

translation.en: all to Mina.
The first saying you have nearly finished your work here and will be leaving within the week.
translation.it: Nella prima dirai che hai quasi finito qui e che partirai in settimana.

translation.en: The second saying that you have now completed your work
translation.it: Nella seconda dirai che hai finito

translation.en: and will be leaving the following day.
translation.it: e che partirai il giorno successivo.

translation.en: And the third saying you have now left the castle and have arrived safely in--
translation.it: Nella terza dirai di aver lasciato il castello e di essere arrivato a...

translation.en: What shall we say?
Bistritz, hmm?
I will send the letters at the appropriate times.
translation.it: Io invierò le lettere al momento giusto.

translation.en: I'll forward the last one to Bistritz,
so it can be sent from there. But why-- Why would I do that?
translation.it: - per farla inviare da lì. - Perché mai dovrei farlo?

translation.en: So that Mina will know that you're coming home.
translation.it: Così Mina saprà che stai tornando.

translation.en: But why would I write the letters in advance?
translation.it: Ma perché dovrei farlo in anticipo?

translation.en: Because the post here is very erratic.
translation.it: Le poste qui sono molto inaffidabili.

translation.en: It's a precaution.
For whom? If...
If something were to happen to me, and those letters had already been sent--
translation.it: Se mi accadesse qualcosa e avessero spedito le lettere...

translation.en: Then Mina wouldn't think to come looking for you here.
translation.it: Mina non penserebbe di venirti a cercare qui.

translation.en: Do you want her to come here?
That's a baby.
-I can hear it crying. -There is no baby.
translation.it: - Lo sento piangere. - Non c'è nessun bambino.

translation.en: Write the letters or don't write the letters.
translation.it: Scrivi le lettere o non scrivere le lettere.

translation.en: It's up to you. I'm only thinking about Mina.
translation.it: Dipende da te. Io sto solo pensando a Mina.

translation.en: Now, if you don't mind, things to do.
translation.it: Ora, scusami, ma ho da fare.

translation.en: See you tomorrow evening. Leave the letters on the table.
translation.it: A domani sera. Lascia le lettere sul tavolo.

translation.en: The dates!
The dates for the letters.
How should I date them?
Well, let's see.
The 12th for the first. Uh, for the second, the 19th.
translation.it: La prima il 12. La seconda il 19.

translation.en: And for the third...
What shall we say? 29th?
29th?
As good a day as any, Johnny.
Good night.
What if I leave? What if I leave this place right now?
translation.it: E se me ne andassi? Se lasciassi subito questo posto?

translation.en: No one is stopping you.
I don't have the strength.
[Dracula] No, I know.
It's not your fault, Johnny. You mustn't blame yourself.
translation.it: Non è colpa tua, Johnny. Non devi sentirti in colpa.

translation.en: [Harker] Please.
Leave the baby.
Johnny, there is no baby.
translation.it: - Lascia il bambino. - Johnny, non c'è nessun bambino.

translation.en: [Harker] I knew in that moment that I had a choice.
translation.it: In quel momento ho capito di avere una scelta.

translation.en: I had been told the span of my life, the limit of my existence: the 29th.
translation.it: Mi era stato comunicato il limite massimo della mia esistenza: il 29.

translation.en: Now, I could stay here dying piece by piece
translation.it: Potevo rimanere lì a morire un po' alla volta

translation.en: till I found myself nailed into one of those boxes.
translation.it: fino a trovarmi inchiodato in una di quelle casse.

translation.en: Or?
Or I could kill Count Dracula.
translation.it: O potevo uccidere il Conte Dracula.

translation.en: Not an easy task in the circumstances.
translation.it: Di certo non facile in quelle circostanze.

translation.en: No, but I had certain advantages.
I should be fascinated to know what they were.
I was enfeebled and trapped.
-Well, indeed. -So, Dracula did not consider me a threat.
translation.it: - Esattamente. - Dracula non mi considerava una minaccia.

translation.en: [Agatha] That's true, yes.
But on the negative side, you were enfeebled and trapped.
translation.it: Ma appunto, era indebolito e intrappolato.

translation.en: I had a potential ally,
one who could climb the castle walls.
One you couldn't even find.
That was because I was looking for the wrong thing.
translation.it: Questo perché stavo cercando la cosa sbagliata.

translation.en: I should've been looking for a map.
Of the castle? But there wasn't one.
translation.it: Del castello? Ma non ce n'erano.

translation.en: That's what Dracula believed.
But in telling me that, he'd also told me where to find it.
translation.it: Ma, nel farlo, mi aveva detto dove trovarla.

translation.en: What did he say?
I missed it.
You did.
Then you're much quicker than me.
translation.it: Lei è molto più sveglio di me.

translation.en: I'm not quick.
I've always been slow.
But the thing is, when you're slow, you know you need to pay attention.
translation.it: Ma se sei lento, sai di dover stare attento.

translation.en: It's the clever ones who never listen.
translation.it: Sono i furbi che non ascoltano mai.

translation.en: You've read all this already in my account.
translation.it: Ha già letto tutto nel mio racconto.

translation.en: [inhales] It's vague in certain crucial regards.
translation.it: È vago in alcuni punti cruciali.

translation.en: Continue, please.
[Harker] It occurred to me that night that Dracula said more than he intended.
translation.it: Avevo capito che Dracula aveva detto più di quanto non volesse.

translation.en: And more than he knew.
translation.it: E più di quanto non sapesse.

translation.en: As he was a creature of the night, I had to wait until morning to test my theory.
translation.it: Ma essendo una creatura notturna dovevo aspettare il mattino per la conferma.

translation.en: The Count said there was no map,
translation.it: Per il conte, non c'erano mappe.

translation.en: but Petruvio was an artist,
and artists always wish to be understood.
translation.it: e gli artisti vogliono sempre essere capiti.

translation.en: The castle was a monument to the architect's lost love
translation.it: Il castello era un monumento al primo amore dell'architetto

translation.en: and the sunlight to which he would never return.
translation.it: e alla luce del sole che non avrebbe più rivisto.

translation.en: And what else is sunlight,
but the face of one's beloved?
The path to the sunlight.
It was clear from the castle maps
that Petruvio had created, within his design,
translation.it: che il progetto creato da Petruvio

translation.en: a system of shortcuts through the maze.
Hidden passages, possibly unknown even to Dracula himself.
translation.it: Passaggi segreti, forse sconosciuti a Dracula stesso.

translation.en: How many times had I looked at that picture and not seen it?
translation.it: Quante volte avevo guardato il quadro senza vederlo?

translation.en: Petruvio's wife was the sunlight,
translation.it: La moglie di Petruvio era la luce

translation.en: and he stood guard at the door.
translation.it: e lui era a guardia della porta.

translation.en: He doesn't know I can get out of the box.
translation.it: Non sa che posso uscire dalla cassa.

translation.en: Don't tell him.
I won't.
Are you his friend now?
[stammering] No, I work for him.
I'm a lawyer from England.
I think he's made you his friend.
translation.it: Credo che ti abbia reso suo amico.

translation.en: Why?
What's England?
It's where I'm from.
You know it. You're speaking English.
I learned it.
-How? -It tasted funny.
Tasted?
Once you are the Count's friend, all languages are the same.
translation.it: Quando sei amico del conte, tutte le lingue sono uguali.

translation.en: I'm hungry.
Was it you at the window?
You left the message?
I smelled you.
You're trapped here.
You're trapped too.
I want to help you.
[woman] Tell him I'm hungry.
He only gives me scraps.
Tiny little things.
Tell him I finished the last one.
I finished it really quickly.
-[shouts] I'm hungry! -[gasps]
Look at it!
It is the sign of the cross.
The symbol of our Lord.
I know.
It's pretty.
You assumed, I suppose, that the cross would ward off evil.
translation.it: Avrà pensato che il crocifisso fosse in grado di allontanare il male.

translation.en: Why are you smiling?
Your faith, I think it's touching.
translation.it: Credo che la sua fede sia toccante.

translation.en: What happened to yours?
I have looked for God everywhere in this world and never found him.
translation.it: Ho cercato Dio ovunque nel mondo e non l'ho trovato.

translation.en: Then why are you here?
Well, like many women of my age, I am trapped in a loveless marriage,
translation.it: Sono intrappolata in un matrimonio senza amore

translation.en: maintaining appearances for the sake of a roof over my head.
translation.it: e mantengo le apparenze per un tetto sulla testa.

translation.en: Now then,
we proceed to your miraculous escape from Castle Dracula
translation.it: procediamo con la sua fuga miracolosa dal castello

translation.en: about which you have been so vague.
translation.it: su cui è stato molto vago.

translation.en: [Harker breathlessly] Somebody?
Please, help!
[Dracula] Johnny, this is interesting.
I've never seen it work with a baby before. Never.
translation.it: Non l'avevo mai visto funzionare su un bambino prima d'ora.

translation.en: I think I might keep it on for a while.
translation.it: Credo che potrei tenerlo per un po'.

translation.en: I hope this doesn't mean that I'm getting sentimental.
translation.it: Spero non significhi che sto diventando sentimentale.

translation.en: -[breathlessly] Why did you kill her? -[Dracula] Who?
because I wanted to see if she would die, I suppose.
translation.it: Perché volevo vedere se sarebbe morta, immagino.

translation.en: Johnny, don't give me that look.
You were a child once. You know the feeling.
Didn't you break your toys apart to see how they worked?
translation.it: rompere i giochi per vedere come funzionano.

translation.en: You are a monster.
translation.it: - Sei un mostro. - E tu un avvocato.

translation.en: And you are a lawyer. Nobody's perfect.
translation.it: - Sei un mostro. - E tu un avvocato. Nessuno è perfetto.

translation.en: A stake through the heart.
You see, sometimes the legends are right.
translation.it: A volte le leggende sono giuste.

translation.en: This is not one you can test too often, though.
translation.it: Ma questa non la si può testare spesso.

translation.en: I only ever have three brides at a time.
translation.it: Ho solo tre spose alla volta.

translation.en: Brides?
Brides, yes. I think that's the right word for it.
translation.it: Sì, credo che si chiamino così.

translation.en: You see, um... [clears throat] I am trying to reproduce.
Which, frankly, can be a bit of a challenge
when there is only one of you.
translation.it: visto che sei rimasto solo tu.

translation.en: Ah, Johnny, you're just about done, aren't you?
translation.it: Johnny, sei quasi al limite, vero?

translation.en: She was a thirsty little thing,
and to think that she was going to keep you in that box all to herself.
translation.it: e pensava di tenerti nella cassa tutta per sé.

translation.en: Are you going to kill me?
Of course I'm going to kill you.
Why does death always come as such a shock to mortals?
translation.it: Perché la morte è sempre un tale shock per i mortali?

translation.en: [Harker] You took everything from me.
[Dracula] Well, of course I did.
You are the high road that leads me to England.
translation.it: Sei la strada maestra che mi porta in Inghilterra.

translation.en: Why England?
The people.
All those sophisticated and intelligent people.
translation.it: Tutta quella gente così sofisticata e intelligente.

translation.en: As I've been trying to tell everyone for centuries, you are what you eat.
translation.it: Come cerco di dire a tutti da secoli: "Sei ciò che mangi".

translation.en: [Dracula] Now...
if you don't mind, I need you to do one last thing for me.
translation.it: Se non ti dispiace, devi fare un'ultima cosa per me.

translation.en: I haven't seen her in hundreds of years.
translation.it: Non lo vedo da centinaia di anni.

translation.en: Describe her to me.
[breathlessly] Who?
I've had artists paint her and poets capture her in words,
translation.it: L'ho fatto dipingere ad artisti e cantare da poeti,

translation.en: and Mozart wrote such a pretty little tune, I...
translation.it: e Mozart gli ha dedicato un gran bel pezzo, io...

translation.en: [clears throat] I really should have spared him, but...
What does a lawyer see?
Johnny, in my memory,
she sits behind the second highest peak at this time of year,
translation.it: egli siede dietro la seconda vetta più alta in questo periodo

translation.en: and she's quite red.
Is she red, Johnny?
Look for yourself.
But that will burn me to dust.
Good.
Fair enough.
Absolutely fair enough.
Will you put me in a box?
[Dracula] Keep your eyes on the sun, Johnny.
translation.it: Continua a fissare il sole, Johnny.

translation.en: It'll be the last time you see her.
translation.it: Sarà l'ultima volta che lo vedrai.

translation.en: There is a box waiting for you in case you walk, yes.
translation.it: C'è una cassa che ti aspetta in caso tu ti risvegliassi, sì.

translation.en: But most people I feed off just die, so you'll probably be fine.
translation.it: Ma di solito la gente da cui bevo muore, quindi forse ti andrà bene.

translation.en: Don't you see? An end is a blessing.
translation.it: Capisci? La fine è una benedizione.

translation.en: Dying gives you size.
translation.it: La morte ti dà una dimensione.

translation.en: It's the mountaintop from which your whole life is at last visible,
translation.it: È la cima della montagna da cui tutta la tua vita è visibile,

translation.en: from beginning to end.
Death completes you.
Spare me.
How?
Answer me. Johnny, how?
How do I spare you?
How indeed, Mr. Harker?
Mr. Harker.
Mr. Harker,
you were about to explain how you escaped from the castle.
translation.it: ci stava spiegando com'è scappato dal castello.

translation.en: Yes.
-You've read my account. -Yes.
translation.it: - Ha letto il mio racconto. - Sì.

translation.en: Perhaps it will help to refresh your memory.
[Harker] "Dracula will be served."
What is this?
"Dracula is my master. Dracula will be obeyed. Drac--
translation.it: "Dracula è il mio padrone. Dracula verrà obbedito.

translation.en: Dracula is the beginning and the end. Dracula is all things. Dracula is God." What?
translation.it: Dracula è l'inizio e la fine. Dracula è tutto. Dracula è Dio." Cosa?

translation.en: I didn't write this.
When you were first brought here, you asked for a pen and paper.
translation.it: Quando è arrivato qui, ha chiesto carta e penna.

translation.en: You were up all day and all night, and this is what you wrote.
translation.it: È stato sveglio giorni e ha scritto questo.

translation.en: No. No, I thought I'd--
[Agatha] You thought you'd written an account of your stay at Castle Dracula.
translation.it: Pensava di aver raccontato del castello.

translation.en: The only account you've given is the account you are giving right now.
translation.it: L'unico suo racconto è quello che ha fatto a noi.

translation.en: It's time to finish your story.
translation.it: È ora di finire la storia.

translation.en: [Dracula] Johnny, how?
How do I spare you?
How?
[Harker] Let me go.
You know why I'm going to England. You know that I'm going to kill people.
translation.it: Sai perché vado in Inghilterra, che ucciderò delle persone.

translation.en: A lot of them. As many as I need, and perhaps even more.
translation.it: Tutte quelle di cui ho bisogno e anche di più.

translation.en: -[choking] I won't. -You won't what?
Oh, you won't tell anyone about me, or try to stop me?
translation.it: Non racconterai di me o proverai a fermarmi?

translation.en: You'll just let me slaughter all those innocents, no questions asked? [laughs]
translation.it: Mi lascerai macellare quegli innocenti senza fare domande?

translation.en: Some lawyer you turned out to be, Johnny.
translation.it: Bell'avvocato che ti sei rivelato, Johnny.

translation.en: [breathlessly] I promise.
[sobbing] I swear.
All right, then.
Do that.
[Dracula] Swear.
I'm going to England to destroy everything and everyone you love,
translation.it: Andrò in Inghilterra a distruggere tutto ciò che ami.

translation.en: but if you give me your word that you won't try to stop me,
translation.it: Ma se mi prometti che non proverai a fermarmi,

translation.en: I'll spare you.
-[softly] It's a trick. -Give me your word.
translation.it: - È un trucco. - Dammi la tua parola.

translation.en: [cries] No, you're going to kill me anyway.
[Dracula] Look me in the eye...
and give me your word.
Count Dracula,
I give you my word.
If you let me out of this place...
translation.it: che se mi farai andare via di qui,

translation.en: [shakily] if you let me live,
then I...
then I will do everything in my power to stop you.
translation.it: Io farò tutto ciò che è in mio potere per fermarti.

translation.en: Quite right.
That's my Johnny. [chuckles]
Welcome to the mountaintop.
I'm not breathing.
Sometimes you do, but I think it's mostly habit.
translation.it: A volte sì, ma credo sia l'abitudine.

translation.en: You have no heartbeat either.
I'm dead.
Undead,
but apparently not yet a vampire.
translation.it: Ma, a quanto pare, non è ancora un vampiro.

translation.en: One must cling on to any good news that there is.
translation.it: Bisogna gioire anche delle piccole cose.

translation.en: I do not serve Dracula.
No, but he's in your mind.
translation.it: No, ma è nella sua mente.

translation.en: The question is, why are you not in one of his boxes?
translation.it: La domanda è: perché non è in una delle casse?

translation.en: I don't know.
[Agatha] It's not something one ever anticipates asking,
translation.it: Non è una cosa che ci si aspetta di chiedere,

translation.en: but what happened after you were murdered?
translation.it: ma cos'è successo dopo che è stato ucciso?

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, that was quick.
Usually people have a lie-down first.
You're going to be a lively one, aren't you?
You came back so quickly, that was impressive.
translation.it: Sei tornato così in fretta, è stato incredibile.

translation.en: You even have the beginnings of a will of your own.
translation.it: Sembri anche avere una volontà tutta tua.

translation.en: None of the others had much beyond hunger, but look at you go!
translation.it: Tutti gli altri avevano solo fame, ma guarda tu come vai.

translation.en: Well, don't you see? This changes everything.
Stay.
You could be my finest bride.
translation.it: Puoi essere la mia sposa migliore.

translation.en: The others just became beasts, but you've kept your spirit.
translation.it: Gli altri sono diventati bestie, ma tu hai ancora il tuo spirito.

translation.en: Johnny, you're like me.
I am not like you.
That's everything. That's...
It's all I remember.
But why did he scream? What did you do?
Nothing. I did nothing. I...
I looked at him, and the next thing I remember was that I was here.
translation.it: Io l'ho guardato e mi sono ritrovato qui.

translation.en: Yes, never mind that.
-We know what happened next. -[Harker] No, I...
I don't... I don't remember.
The river bore you out to sea,
translation.it: Il fiume l'ha portata al mare

translation.en: and a fisherman found you, caught in their net.
translation.it: e un pescatore l'ha trovata in una rete.

translation.en: A drowned man walking and talking arouses a certain amount of curiosity,
translation.it: Un uomo affogato che cammina e parla suscita molta curiosità.

translation.en: and you were brought to me, babbling of a girl called Mina whose face you had forgotten
translation.it: L'hanno portata da me. Blaterava di una Mina di cui non ricordava il viso

translation.en: and an evil Count who had stolen your soul. Why was I brought to you?
translation.it: - e di un conte che le ha rubato l'anima. - Perché da lei?

translation.en: I am known to have some expertise in the realm of witchcraft and the occult.
translation.it: Sono un'esperta di stregoneria e di occulto.

translation.en: You're a nun.
We can discuss my imperfectly suppressed fascination
translation.it: Rimandiamo la discussione sulla mia mal repressa passione

translation.en: with everything dark and evil another time.
For now, we will focus on why Dracula screamed.
translation.it: Per ora, ci concentreremo sul perché Dracula abbia urlato.

translation.en: You were facing the sun.
Yes.
I have sought to find God all my life and never found a sign of him anywhere.
translation.it: Ho cercato di trovare Dio tutta la vita e non ne ho mai trovato un segno.

translation.en: Why now? Why you? Why him?
translation.it: Perché ora? Perché lei? Perché lui?

translation.en: -I don't understand. -Then think!
[Agatha] Count Dracula fears the cross.
translation.it: Il Conte Dracula teme il crocifisso.

translation.en: He fears the symbol of our Lord.
translation.it: Teme il simbolo di nostro Signore.

translation.en: -The girl didn't. -Never mind the girl. She was nothing.
translation.it: - La ragazza no. - Lei non era niente.

translation.en: Dracula, prince among vampires, fears the cross.
translation.it: Dracula, il principe dei vampiri, teme il crocifisso.

translation.en: Do you understand what that means?
No, tell me.
God is real.
God is real, and I've found him at last.
translation.it: Dio è reale e finalmente l'ho trovato.

translation.en: [Harker] You have found the Devil.
translation.it: - Ha trovato il Diavolo. - Se serve il Diavolo per portarmi

translation.en: If it takes the Devil to bring me to my Lord, then I say bring on the Devil!
translation.it: - Ha trovato il Diavolo. - Se serve il Diavolo per portarmi dal mio Signore, evviva il Diavolo!

translation.en: -I don't! -[Agatha] And why not?
God saved you for a reason, don't you think?
translation.it: Dio l'ha salvata - per un motivo. - Non sono salvo.

translation.en: I'm not saved.
translation.it: - per un motivo. - Non sono salvo.

translation.en: I'm nothing.
Would Mina think that?
If she could see me, yes, she would.
Look at me.
I can't even remember her face.
translation.it: Non ricordo nemmeno il suo viso.

translation.en: Yes, I think you have proven that to our satisfaction.
translation.it: Sì, questo ce l'ha dimostrato ampiamente.

translation.en: [Agatha] Mr. Harker, I apologize for the deception.
translation.it: Sig. Harker, mi scuso per l'inganno.

translation.en: It was necessary she heard the story from your own lips.
translation.it: Era necessario che sentisse la storia di persona.

translation.en: You may have forgotten your fiancée's face,
translation.it: Avrai anche dimenticato il viso della tua fidanzata...

translation.en: but I have not lost you yet.
translation.it: ma io non ti ho ancora perso.

translation.en: Hello, Johnny.
Your eyes are still blue, at least.
translation.it: I tuoi occhi sono ancora blu, almeno.

translation.en: [Agatha] Having established your identity,
it was not difficult to trace you back to England and find your worried fiancée.
translation.it: non è stato difficile rintracciare la sua fidanzata preoccupata.

translation.en: I have a detective acquaintance in London.
Mina. [Mina] Did you really think,
even in your darkest moment,
translation.it: che nel tuo momento più buio

translation.en: that I wouldn't come for you?
translation.it: io non sarei venuta da te?

translation.en: Did you think it was even possible that I could abandon the man I love?
translation.it: Pensi che avrei potuto abbandonare l'uomo che amo?

translation.en: I am no longer that man.
Dearest one,
we are to be married.
And so let me be plain,
who you are will always be my decision.
translation.it: chi sei sarà sempre una mia decisione.

translation.en: Dracula is here.
How exciting.
Look after Mina.
[Harker] Mina.
Take it, please.
[Mina] Why?
[Harker] Because you're bleeding.
And I can't stand it.
Take it!
Mother Superior, on no account invite that creature in.
translation.it: Madre superiora, non fare entrare quella creatura.

translation.en: That is not a temptation with which I was struggling.
translation.it: Non è una tentazione a cui faccio fatica a resistere.

translation.en: What is happening? What is this?
We are under attack from the forces of darkness.
translation.it: Siamo sotto attacco delle forze oscure.

translation.en: Why would the forces of darkness wish to attack a convent?
translation.it: Perché le forze oscure vorrebbero attaccare un convento?

translation.en: Perhaps they are sensitive to criticism.
I know who you are.
I've studied the legends.
I am fully aware that I am addressing Count Dracula.
translation.it: Sono perfettamente consapevole di avere davanti il Conte Dracula.

translation.en: The bats are a little noisy. Would you mind?
translation.it: I pipistrelli fanno rumore, ti dispiace?

translation.en: Listen to me.
You are Jonathan Harker.
You would never harm me.
translation.it: Non mi faresti mai del male.

translation.en: I know I am safe with you.
translation.it: So di essere al sicuro con te.

translation.en: [Mina] It's me.
Look at me.
See me.
My blue-eyed Johnny.
translation.it: Il mio Johnny dagli occhi blu.

translation.en: Don't.
Oh, please, don't.
You don't need to do that.
I know you don't!
[screaming] Johnny!
The sun is down. You don't need to hide anymore.
translation.it: Il sole è tramontato. Non devi più nasconderti.

translation.en: Or are you too afraid to step from the shadows?
translation.it: O hai troppa paura di venire fuori dalle ombre?

translation.en: Please.
Let me.
-Johnny. -[Harker] Let me.
-Please. -[Mina cries] Johnny.
I'm sorry.
-Somebody help! Please! -[metal clangs]
This is devilry.
[Agatha] It's worse than that.
It is the Devil.
I don't know about you girls,
but I do love a bit of fur.
translation.it: ma a me un po' di pelo piace.

translation.en: Suffer unto me.
I'm not sure what legends you've been reading,
translation.it: Non so quali leggende tu abbia letto,

translation.en: but bells don't have any effect on me.
translation.it: ma le campane non mi fanno niente.

translation.en: This one will.
Sister Agatha, have you been up to one of your secret projects again?
translation.it: Suor Agatha, è di nuovo uno dei tuoi progetti segreti?

translation.en: You'd better hope so. [Dracula] This is exciting.
translation.it: - Farà meglio a sperarlo. - Che emozione.

translation.en: This'll be the most nuns I've had in one sitting.
translation.it: Non ho mai mangiato tante suore tutte insieme...

translation.en: Sisters, present arms.
I see my arrival was anticipated.
translation.it: Vedo che vi aspettavate il mio arrivo.

translation.en: I was aware of the possibility.
Sister Agatha, what have you brought down upon us?
Cooee!
Hello!
Hello, ladies!
I don't want to worry you,
but the army of the faithful can't seem to look me in the eye.
translation.it: ma il tuo esercito ha paura di guardarmi.

translation.en: You're naked, and they're nuns. It isn't your eye they're not looking at.
translation.it: Tu sei nudo e loro suore. Non è la faccia il problema.

translation.en: [Dracula] Well, isn't anyone going to invite me in?
translation.it: Beh, nessuna mi invita a entrare?

translation.en: I've come a long way to see you.
translation.it: Ho fatto tanta strada per vedervi.

translation.en: Certainly not.
Sister Rosa, the key.
[whispers] You can't be serious.
I am more than serious. I'm completely confident.
[Dracula] How did you know that I was coming?
[Agatha] There's a man here you consider to be your property.
translation.it: Qui c'è un uomo che consideri tua proprietà.

translation.en: -My bride. -He is what drew you here, I think.
translation.it: - La mia sposa. - È lui che ti ha attirato qui, credo.

translation.en: A bee can always find nectar. And a trap always needs honey.
translation.it: - Un'ape trova sempre il nettare. - E a una trappola serve sempre il miele.

translation.en: I don't think this is a trap.
Well, it wouldn't be a very good trap if you did.
translation.it: Non sarebbe una buona trappola, altrimenti.

translation.en: Thank you, Sister.
Count Dracula, please attend my words with care.
translation.it: Conte Dracula, ascolta le mie parole con cura.

translation.en: This is Saint Mary's Convent of Budapest, and you're not welcome here.
translation.it: Questo è il convento di Santa Maria di Budapest e tu non sei il benvenuto.

translation.en: You are most specifically not invited in.
translation.it: Nello specifico, non sei invitato ad entrare.

translation.en: So, it's true, then.
-That's interesting. -[Mother Superior] What is?
[Agatha] A vampire may not enter any abode
translation.it: Un vampiro non può entrare in nessuna casa

translation.en: unless invited in. I wasn't sure about that one.
translation.it: senza un invito. Non ne ero sicura.

translation.en: -A vampire? -You unlocked the gate
translation.it: - Un vampiro? - Hai aperto il cancello

translation.en: and you weren't sure?
-A vampire? -Oh, the iron wasn't keeping you out.
translation.it: Il ferro non ti avrebbe fermato.

translation.en: You could have torn it apart like matchwood.
I could tear you apart.
Not from out there, you couldn't.
But what's stopping you?
A feeling? A force?
Is it physical or mental?
-Why do you need an invitation? -Do you expect me to tell you?
translation.it: - Perché serve un invito? - Devo dirtelo?

translation.en: Oh, I don't even expect you to know.
translation.it: Non mi aspetto che tu lo sappia.

translation.en: A beast can follow rules. I don't expect it to understand them.
translation.it: Una bestia segue le regole, ma non le capisce.

translation.en: I am more than a beast.
translation.it: Io sono più di una bestia.

translation.en: In what way?
But by your own account,
you've been on this earth for hundreds of years,
translation.it: sei sulla terra da centinaia di anni

translation.en: and you can't even walk into a nunnery?
translation.it: e non riesci a entrare in un convento?

translation.en: An ox could do it.
-How are you more than a beast? -You want me to show you?
translation.it: - Sei più di una bestia? - Te lo dimostro?

translation.en: Of course. I'm waiting.
Come here, come here a moment.
translation.it: Vieni qui, vieni qui un momento.

translation.en: Come closer.
Look at them.
Look at your sisters.
-Armed and ready. -You're not looking.
translation.it: - Armate e pronte. - Non stai guardando.

translation.en: I don't need to.
One of them. That's all I need.
translation.it: Una di loro. È tutto ciò che mi serve.

translation.en: If just one of your pretty little army beckons me in,
translation.it: Se solo una delle tue belle sorelle mi farà cenno di entrare,

translation.en: I will tear your world to pieces,
translation.it: farò a pezzi il tuo mondo

translation.en: and I will drink my fill.
Why would they invite you in? What do you have to offer?
translation.it: Perché dovrebbero invitarti? Cos'hai da offrire?

translation.en: -Eternal life. -Well, they have that already.
translation.it: - La vita eterna. - Beh, ce l'hanno già.

translation.en: Thanks. Starting tonight,
because the first one to invite me in stays at my side.
translation.it: perché chi mi invita a entrare rimane al mio fianco.

translation.en: The others, I will tear apart, and, ladies,
translation.it: Le altre saranno fatte a pezzi e, signore,

translation.en: I will take my time.
One should never rush a nun.
translation.it: Mai avere fretta con una suora.

translation.en: Your words are not welcome here.
translation.it: Le tue parole non ci attirano.

translation.en: Well, if you find you're not tempted by my offer,
translation.it: Se non siete tentate dalla mia offerta,

translation.en: ask yourself this:
who is?
Who's weakest?
Who's the most afraid? Who will break first?
translation.it: Chi ha più paura? Chi crollerà per prima?

translation.en: Is there still time for it to be you?
What's that? What are you doing?
You wanted to know who's weakest.
translation.it: Vuoi sapere chi è il più debole.

translation.en: I'm showing you.
Oh, go on, help yourself.
There's a dog comes past here most days.
translation.it: Spesso viene a trovarci un cane.

translation.en: We often give it scraps.
Go on. You've come so far.
translation.it: Dai. Hai fatto così tanta strada.

translation.en: I'm sure you could do with a drink.
translation.it: So che ti andrebbe un drink.

translation.en: See, I'm not certain I see the appeal... of blood.
translation.it: Non sono sicura di capirne l'attrattiva.

translation.en: [Agatha] Each to his own I suppose.
Do you think provoking me is clever?
Yes, I do.
I want to learn about you.
I want to see the limit of your capability.
translation.it: Voglio vedere il limite delle tue capacità.

translation.en: -It's the point of this experiment. -You have no conception,
translation.it: - È lo scopo di questo esperimento. - Non hai idea,

translation.en: not the first idea...
Here, boy.
This is contemptible.
-You are without shame. -Be careful what you say to me.
translation.it: - Sei senza vergogna. - Attenta a quello che mi dici.

translation.en: Don't speak with your mouth full.
translation.it: Non parlare con la bocca piena.

translation.en: She has earned the right to express her contempt, you know? We all have.
translation.it: Abbiamo tutto il diritto di esprimere disprezzo.

translation.en: Each of these women in front of you has turned her back on earthly pleasures,
translation.it: Ognuna di queste donne ha voltato le spalle ai piaceri terreni,

translation.en: resisting all forms of temptation.
translation.it: resistendo a ogni forma di tentazione.

translation.en: We have freed ourselves of appetite
and, therefore, of fear.
That is why you can't bear the sight of this.
translation.it: Per questo non sopporti la vista di questo.

translation.en: It speaks of the holy virtue you do not possess.
translation.it: Parla della virtù divina che non possiedi.

translation.en: It is goodness incarnate.
For a moment there, I thought you were clever.
translation.it: Per un attimo ho pensato che fossi intelligente.

translation.en: But no. No, that's not why I fear the cross.
translation.it: Ma no, non è per quello che temo il crocifisso.

translation.en: Goodness has got nothing to do with it.
[Agatha] So you say.
But how can a mere beast understand its own fear?
translation.it: Ma come fa una bestia a capire le proprie paure?

translation.en: No one will invite you in, Count Dracula.
We'll just pity you right where you are.
Who are you?
[Agatha] Finish your scraps. It's all you'll be getting tonight.
translation.it: Finisci gli avanzi, non avrai altro.

translation.en: That's your name, isn't it?
Mother Superior used my name. You heard her.
translation.it: La Madre superiora mi ha chiamata per nome.

translation.en: -You'll have to do better than that. -You're from somewhere else, I think.
translation.it: - Dovrai fare di meglio. - Vieni da un altro Paese, credo.

translation.en: Holland, right?
Well, you can tell as much from my accent, I think. I bid you good night.
translation.it: - Dall'Olanda, giusto? - Lo si capisce dall'accento, credo. Buonanotte.

translation.en: [Dracula shouts] Helsing!
What is your interest in me, Agatha Van Helsing?
translation.it: Qual è il tuo interesse per me, Agatha Van Helsing?

translation.en: Who are you?
Your every nightmare at once.
An educated woman in a crucifix.
translation.it: Una donna istruita con un crocifisso.

translation.en: [Agatha] He was a brave man.
He must have loved you very much.
What is he?
What is Count Dracula?
In life, he was a prince of exceptional learning and attainment.
translation.it: In vita, era un principe di eccezionale cultura e successo.

translation.en: In death, I suppose you could say he's the best of the vampires.
translation.it: Nella morte, si può dire che sia il migliore dei vampiri.

translation.en: -The best? -The most successful, I mean.
translation.it: - Il migliore? - Il più riuscito, intendo.

translation.en: Most are feral, half-mad.
They rarely last long, and yet, somehow, Dracula has found a way to retain his human form
translation.it: e durano poco ma, in qualche modo, Dracula ha tenuto la propria forma umana

translation.en: and intellect, more or less intact, for hundreds of years.
translation.it: e il proprio intelletto quasi intatto per secoli.

translation.en: -By drinking blood. -[Agatha] Ah, they all drink blood.
Dracula has learned to do it well.
translation.it: Lui ha imparato a farlo bene.

translation.en: I think, by choosing his victims with the greatest of care.
translation.it: Scegliendo le vittime con molta cura.

translation.en: Even in death, he has retained the discrimination of an aristocrat.
translation.it: Anche nella morte, è rimasto discriminatore come un aristocratico.

translation.en: And so, he took my Johnny.
translation.it: E così, ha preso il mio Johnny.

translation.en: [Agatha] Come, the Mother Superior will want to lead us in prayer.
translation.it: Vieni, la Madre superiora vorrà guidarci in preghiera.

translation.en: [Mina] I don't see the point in praying.
God is nowhere.
In which case, it is up to us to stop Count Dracula.
translation.it: In tal caso, spetta a noi fermare il Conte Dracula.

translation.en: And we will, won't we?
Yes, we will.
[Mina] Goodbye, Johnny Blue Eyes.
I shan't ever love anyone else, you know.
Quite right.
[Dracula whispering] Johnny.
Johnny Blue Eyes.
Suicide doesn't work.
Don't you think the undead have tried that?
translation.it: I non morti ci hanno già provato.

translation.en: [Dracula] Stake through the heart, that's fine,
but someone else needs to put it there.
I'm willing to give it a try.
Do you want me to do that?
Do you want me to kill you properly?
translation.it: Vuoi che ti uccida come si deve?

translation.en: All you have to do...
is invite me in.
[Mother Superior] We face danger.
We face evil,
which stands at the gate of our most holy sanctuary.
translation.it: che si presenta alle porte del nostro sacro santuario.

translation.en: God is with us, as we know.
translation.it: Dio è con noi, come sapete.

translation.en: God's love is eternal.
This we know, too.
Tonight, in our most deadly hour,
translation.it: Stasera, nella nostra ora più mortale,

translation.en: do we think our God will remember us?
translation.it: pensiamo che Dio si ricorderà di noi?

translation.en: Will he reach down and save us from death's shadow?
translation.it: Tenderà la mano per salvarci dall'ombra della morte?

translation.en: No, he will not.
Where in our world is God to be found?
translation.it: Dove si trova Dio nel nostro mondo?

translation.en: In our prayer?
In our song?
In our suffering? In our endurance?
Faith is not a transaction.
translation.it: La fede non è una transazione.

translation.en: You do not barter with the infinite.
You align with it.
So then, where do we find our God?
translation.it: Allora, dove troviamo il nostro Dio?

translation.en: Sisters, I will tell you.
When you stand in the deepest pit,
translation.it: Quando vi trovate nella fossa più profonda,

translation.en: alone, without hope or help, and yet still know right from wrong.
translation.it: sole, senza aiuto né speranza, ma in grado di distinguere tra giusto e sbagliato.

translation.en: When there is only darkness and despair,
translation.it: Quando c'è solo oscurità e disperazione,

translation.en: and yet you feel humming in your blood,
the difference between good and bad.
translation.it: la differenza tra il bene e il male.

translation.en: When you are beyond rescue, or reward, or judgment,
translation.it: Quando non c'è più possibilità di salvezza, premio o giudizio

translation.en: and you still look evil in the face and say,
translation.it: e ancora guardate il male negli occhi e dite:

translation.en: "No. This far, but no further.
translation.it: "No! Sei arrivato fin qui, ma non puoi andare oltre.

translation.en: Whose voice is that?
Who's with you in that darkness?
Whose voice keeps you to the path?
translation.it: Quale voce vi tiene sul cammino?

translation.en: Darkness and evil may seem compelling to us all,
translation.it: L'oscurità e il male possono sembrarci irresistibili

translation.en: and I believe it is because in their presence,
translation.it: e io credo sia perché, in loro presenza,

translation.en: we can feel God in our hearts.
No, he will not reach down to save us.
translation.it: No, lui non tenderà la mano per salvarci.

translation.en: We will rise to meet him.
translation.it: Noi ci innalzeremo verso di lui.

translation.en: Let us pray.
She was clearing her throat.
I think it's fine now.
So, ladies, who's next?
translation.it: Allora, signore, chi è la prossima?

translation.en: It's just that I have a very hard time deciding who's gonna be--
translation.it: È solo che non riesco a decidere chi sarà...

translation.en: Here's an idea.
Catch.
This will be the safest spot.
-[Mina] What is this place? -My workshop.
Here, where the sunlight hits.
translation.it: Vieni qui, dove filtra la luce del sole.

translation.en: -It's nighttime. -In the morning.
[Mina] It's not morning for hours.
[Agatha] I know.
[Dracula] Who's got it? Who's caught it?
translation.it: Chi ce l'ha? Chi l'ha presa?

translation.en: Ah, we have a winner!
-What's that? -Jesus.
Jesus?
[Agatha] Bread.
Sacramental bread.
Oh, of course.
Nuns. You have those things which work, actually,
translation.it: Suore. Avete quella cosa che, in effetti, funziona

translation.en: even though you will...
never guess why.
So I suppose I'll just have to control myself,
but between you and me,
controlling wolves is just so much more fun.
translation.it: controllare dei lupi è molto più divertente.

translation.en: It's a question of who you'd rather have tear you apart, I suppose.
translation.it: Decidete voi da chi preferite farvi fare a pezzi.

translation.en: You have a choice, of course.
I'm undead, I'm not unreasonable.
translation.it: Sono un non morto, ma sono ragionevole.

translation.en: Oh! Ow, that must have hurt.
It's all right. The screaming has stopped.
translation.it: Tranquilla, le urla si sono fermate.

translation.en: I don't know how you could bear to listen to that.
I brought it on them.
Listening was my punishment. [sniffles]
Dracula's going to find us, isn't he?
[Agatha] Of course.
How is bread going to keep him out?
-Sacramental bread. -[Mina] But how?
I don't know. None of the vampire legends make sense, and yet,
translation.it: Non lo so. Le leggende sui vampiri non hanno senso,

translation.en: somehow, they are proving to be true.
He can't enter a home
without being invited. Why not?
The light of the day would burn him to death. Why?
translation.it: La luce del giorno lo farebbe morire carbonizzato. Perché?

translation.en: He's terrified of the cross, and yet he's no believer.
translation.it: È terrorizzato dal crocifisso, eppure non è credente.

translation.en: Somehow, these facts are all the same fact.
translation.it: In qualche modo, questi fatti sono tutti simili.

translation.en: There's one thing that Dracula fears above all.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che Dracula teme sopra ogni cosa.

translation.en: And to destroy him, we must discover it.
translation.it: E per distruggerlo, dobbiamo scoprire qual è.

translation.en: He got into the convent. How did he get in here?
translation.it: Come ha fatto a entrare nel convento?

translation.en: Well, clearly, there was an invitation.
Then someone invited him.
[Harker] Mina?
[Mina shakily] I thought you were...
I saw you dead.
I couldn't stop him, Mina.
I let him inside.
-He's inside. -We know, Johnny.
He killed everyone.
Do not cross that line. You can't come any closer.
translation.it: Non oltrepassare quella linea. Non puoi farlo.

translation.en: [Mina] Let him in.
We cannot trust him.
He is strong, stronger than you think.
translation.it: È più forte di quanto pensi.

translation.en: -And if I'm with him-- -[Agatha] No one is strong enough.
translation.it: - Con me... - Nessuno è così forte.

translation.en: -No one. -Please!
-We can't just leave him out there. -Do not invite him in.
translation.it: - Non possiamo lasciarlo lì. - Non invitarlo.

translation.en: Come here, Johnny.
Come to me.
I... am inviting you to be with me.
translation.it: Ti sto invitando a stare con me.

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing. He let Dracula in. He will do it again!
translation.it: Non farlo. Ha fatto entrare Dracula. Lo farà di nuovo!

translation.en: [Mina] He won't. Will you, Johnny?
'Cause I'm here with you,
and I will give you strength.
The two of us, together, we can be stronger.
translation.it: Noi due insieme possiamo essere forti.

translation.en: Johnny, your eyes...
He's inside.
Why aren't your eyes blue anymore?
translation.it: Perché i tuoi occhi non sono più blu?

translation.en: [whispering] They're not my eyes.
Hello.
I've been dying to meet you.
